description: Smallest composite x such that sigma(x) + 2n = sigma(x + 2n).
comments: a(19) > 4293000000, if it exists. - _Jud McCranie_, May 25 2000
links: Mauro Fiorentini, Le soluzioni dellâ€™equazione s(n + k) = s(n) + k, con n composto fino a 109 e k sino a 1000.
example: a(5) corresponds to n=3+2=5, d=2n=10 and the smallest composite integer is 195556. The next solution is 1152136225.
author: _Labos Elemer_ May 23 2000
